fruits.name: Apple
fruits.description: A sweet, edible fruit produced by an apple tree.

fruits.name: Banana
fruits.description: A long, curved fruit with a yellow skin and soft, sweet, white flesh inside.

fruits.name: Cherry
fruits.description: A small, round stone fruit that is typically bright or dark red.

fruits.name: Date
fruits.description: A sweet fruit from the date palm tree, typically oval and brown.

fruits.name: Elderberry
fruits.description: A small, dark berry from the elder tree, often used in jams and syrups.
